# [Interview #610: London Signing Report - Thomas C, Entry #8](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=610#8)

#### Question

Fans wanted to know when the next book in the
*Way of Kings*
series would be out.

#### Brandon Sanderson

Sanderson confirmed this would be after the last Wheel of Time book was published.
